content:
# We have successfully harvested another 20 iron ore, updating our inventory to `{'coal': 8, 'iron-ore': 21, 'iron-plate': 45}`.
# This gives us enough iron ore to keep our furnaces operational.

# Now, let's distribute iron ore to the furnaces again. Since we have 21 iron ore, we can give each of the four furnaces 5 iron ore without running low.
# This will ensure that all furnaces can continue smelting efficiently.

# Distributing 5 pieces of iron ore into each furnace.
for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}):
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into each furnace.

# After distributing the iron ore, we will check the updated inventory and the operational statuses of the furnaces once more.
print(f"Updated Inventory after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Furnace statuses: {[inspect_inventory(furnace) for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})]}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
